comment: Daniel White: Robinhood's fees are higher than advertised and their platform lacks important features.
Michael Brown: Robinhood offers a great trading experience with low spreads and fast execution. Very satisfied!
Mia Miller: My experience with Robinhood has been average. They offer standard features but nothing exceptional.
James Wilson: Robinhood offers a great trading experience with low spreads and fast execution. Very satisfied!
Andrew Thomas: I've had a mixed experience with Robinhood. Some features are good, others need work.
